# Copilot Instructions for Calorie Counter PWA

### React/UI
- Uses React Router 7
- Mobile-first responsive design with CSS Modules
- Style with CSS Modules and global theme variables in `styles/theme.css`
- Component CSS modules pattern: `component.module.css` (e.g., `loading-spinner.module.css`)
- Rspack serves on localhost:8080

#### Structure
- `assets/` – Static Files & Media
- `components/` – Shared UI Components
- `pages/` – Route-Level Components
- `routes/` – Routing Configuration
- `hooks/` – Custom Hooks
- `services/` – External API Logic
- `utils/` – Utility Functions
- `types/` - TypeScript Types & Interfaces
- `styles/` - Global Styling & Theme Config
